name: Rainbringer
description:
In Rainbringer you play as Creatures, alien beings that came to a lifeless Earth from an asteroid. Fresh water ceases to exist on Earth and plant life is no longer living. With a single rain cloud that follows the Creature, you navigate the desolate landscape of Earth slowly bringing back life. Using water and lightning from your rain cloud you must solve puzzles and find plant life to replenish. At the end of each journey, after you have solved the puzzles and regrown all plant life, that level is complete and the ecosystem is restored. 

Grow plants using rain and even fill obstacles.

Grow and climb vines!

Creature seems happy, you might be too if you try out my game!
